properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O come, O come, Immanuel,
and ransom captive Israel,
that mourns in lonely exile here
until the Son of God appear:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O come, thou Wisdom from above
who ord'rest all things through thy love;
to us the path of knowledge show
and teach us in her ways to go:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O come, O come, Thou Lord of might
who to your tribes on Sinai's height
in ancient times didst give the law
in cloud, and majesty, and awe:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O come, Thou Rod of Jesse, free
your own from Satan's tyranny;
from depths of hell your people save
and give them vict'ry o'er the grave:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O come, O Key of David, come
and open wide our heavenly home;
make safe the way that leads on high,
and close the path to misery:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
O come, O Dayspring, come and cheer
Our spirits by your advent here;
disperse the gloomy clouds of night,
and death's dark shadows put to flight:

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
O come, Desire of nations, bring
all peoples to their Saviour King;
thou Corner-stone, who makest one,
complete in us thy work begun:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Rejoice! Rejoice!
Immanuel shall come to you, O Israel.
